EmailTemplate.name: Licensee invitation notification - business
EmailTemplate.subject: You invited {!Associations__c.Child_Licensee_Name__c} to join your business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You invited {!Associations__c.Child_Licensee_Name__c} to join your business {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
Weâ€™ll email you when they respond.
Please contact us if you did not send or approve this invitation.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI004
